conbody.p: Follow these steps to install the shared assembly into the Global Assembly Cache (GAC).

ol.li: Go to the NativeClient_xxxx directory. cd %GFCPP%
Run the GAC utility to install GemStone.GemFire.Cache.dll into the GAC. gacutil.exe /if GemStone.GemFire.Cache.dll

conbody.p: When you are ready to uninstall, use the /u switch. More information on the GAC utility can be found at http://www.msdn.com, or by using gacutil.exe /?.
